name: App
description: Application wrapper for shadcn theme and overlay layers.

use: you want a root app wrapper that wires shadcn Theme + overlay managers.
you need WidgetsApp/WidgetsApp.router with shadcn defaults.
avoid: you only need one isolated widget without app-level theming/overlays.

theming: Uses shadcn ThemeData and optionally animates theme transitions.
Wraps descendants with `ShadcnUI` and overlay manager layer.
accessibility: Supports localization delegates and locales via WidgetsApp APIs.
do: Use this at the root of your app when relying on shadcn overlays.
dont: Do not nest multiple root app wrappers in the same tree.
